name: Email OAuth2 Proxy
description: IMAP/POP/SMTP proxy that adds OAuth2 support for email clients. Lets you use app passwords or OAuth2 with providers (e.g. Microsoft, Google) on ports IMAP 1993, POP 1995, SMTP 1587.

notes.text: Edit /etc/emailproxy/emailproxy.config and add your OAuth client credentials.
First-time auth: use the menu 'Authorise account' or run with --external-auth.
